snippet: Thrown together after their children misbehave in school, five very different women form a support group in “Tyler Perry’s The Single Moms Club.”
abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews movie Tyler Perry's Single Moms Club, written and directed by Tyler Perry and starring Zulay Henao, Cocoa Brown and Nia Long.
lead_paragraph: Thrown together after their children misbehave in school, five very different women form a support group in “Tyler Perry’s The Single Moms Club.”

headline.print_headline: A Cranky Bonding Agent for Society’s Oil and Water
headline.seo: Motley Group Vents in ‘Tyler Perry’s The Single Moms Club’
headline.main: A Cranky Bonding Agent for Society’s Oil and Water
headline.kicker: Movie Review | ‘Tyler Perry’s The Single Moms Club’
